name: WithTop.canonicallyOrderedAdd
initialProofState:
α : Type u
inst✝² : Add α
inst✝¹ : Preorder α
inst✝ : CanonicallyOrderedAdd α
⊢ CanonicallyOrderedAdd (WithTop α)
decl:
instance canonicallyOrderedAdd [Add α] [Preorder α] [CanonicallyOrderedAdd α] :
    CanonicallyOrderedAdd (WithTop α) :=
  { WithTop.existsAddOfLE with
    le_self_add := fun a b =>
      match a, b with
      | ⊤, ⊤ => le_rfl
      | (a : α), ⊤ => le_top
      | (a : α), (b : α) => WithTop.coe_le_coe.2 le_self_add
      | ⊤, (b : α) => le_rfl }
